title: UPI transactions jump 36 pc to Rs 60 lakh cr in Jun qtr
description: UPI transactions surged by over 36% to Rs 60 lakh crore in the first quarter of the current fiscal year, as reported by Minister of State for Finance, Pankaj Chaudhary. A total of 4,122 crore UPI transactions were conducted between April and June 2024. Additionally, a new cardless cash deposit facility through UPI has been introduced.
